name: Antichromatic
description:
The world has been fractured into two dimensions. Can you find the source of the fracture and reunite the two halves? Run, jump, shoot, and wall climb your way through a torturous facility as you search for the answer of how the reunite the two dimensions.

Created originally for Ludum Dare 26, the game has been improved and expanded upon to create an epic platforming experience.

Antichromatic requires an updated flash player and modern hardware, as it uses a stage3d based rendering engine. Antichromatic was written using the Axel game library. Visit the Axel homepage for more information.
